      • normalizeVersion

        public static String normalizeVersion(String version)
        Getting the normalized version of an artifact. The artifact has to have at least three digits inside the version separated by dots. If there are less than two dots inside the version it is extended with the necessary numbers of ".0".
        Parameters:
        version - The version that is checked.
        Returns:
        A normalizad version.
